page.title: 08HOUSING
page.content: Our block contains a wide variety of housing styles and prices. Three quarters of the housing stock date from the mid-fifties when green belt and farming land was eaten away by new estates needed to house the growing population of Nottingham. Chilwell, Bramcote and Beeston are rated highly and there are many detached properties which command a high price. Stapleford has some large Victorian houses but there are many traditional terraced and town houses toward the town centre. The Council have built and rent out many houses in Chilwell and Stapleford.
